tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (SINV (VP (VBP Have) (NP (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ nice) (NN day)) (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS friends))) (: ...) (NP (NP (NNP Beautiful) (NNP wednesday)) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT all)))))) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS friends)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN twitter))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Have/VBP dobj>[day/NN det>a/DT amod>nice/JJ dep>[friends/NNS nmod:poss>my/PRP$] punct>.../: dep>[wednesday/NNP compound>Beautiful/NNP nmod:for>[all/DT case>for/IN]]] nsubj>[friends/NNS nmod:poss>my/PRP$ nmod:in>[twitter/NN case>in/IN]]]
